crop_calendars

Source: R/crop_calendars.R
crop_calendars.Rd

Generate planting months for each country Data from SAGE

Usage

crop_calendars(output_dir = file.path(getwd(), "output"))

Arguments

output_dir

Default = file.path(getwd(), 'output'). String for output directory

Value

A data frame of crop calendars

On this page
